title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body:
I bought my computer 2 days ago. But I can't accept my ID and patch the update.

I already did the solution which someone wrote. It didn't work for me. 

Someone helps me to fix this problem.

P.S I uninstalled the game before. Even though I opened "LeagueClientSettings", it doesn't have 'gameflow-patcher-lock'

replies.body: If you still haven't been able to get signed in, there might be something blocking that new computers connection attempts. Run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you've got everything properly configured.
Got the same problem but im pretty sure they will fix soon
